channel.title: Auto-Spawn
channel.description:
[code] server.npcHandler.newNPC(2627, 2401, 5084, playerId, 2401, 5084, 2401, 5084, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(2627), false); [/code]
That auto-spawn code works fine in my winter love server. Problem is, when I use it on a dodian source, you have to take off the ", false" part for it to even work. When you take off that part, there is nothing to tell the server not to re-spawn it.
I got my fight caves working on love's servers, not dodian. Any idea's?

item.title: Auto-Spawn
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“Zombiedevice, post:1, topic:198135”] server.npcHandler.newNPC(2627, 2401, 5084, playerId, 2401, 5084, 2401, 5084, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(2627), false);

That auto-spawn code works fine in my winter love server. Problem is, when I use it on a dodian source, you have to take off the “, false” part for it to even work. When you take off that part, there is nothing to tell the server not to re-spawn it.

I got my fight caves working on love’s servers, not dodian. Any idea’s?[/quote]Woohoo! Finally somebody who gives credit to winterlove!

Read full topic
